about_the_game:
Oddware is a science fiction visual novel told in an alternative future. It explores themes of connection and discovery.
You are Android SR-GEN01. The year is 2231 and you wake in a dark room with no memory or data informing you of who or where you are and/or how you got here.

From there the story is yours to shape and change. Along the way you will meet Dirt, Nova, Vera and 001 other androids with unique personalities and goals whom you can form bonds and interact with. What actions will you take? How will your choices and decisions affect the story, your connections and your quest for meaning?

Wishlist today to be among the first to join androids Dirt, Nova, Vera, 001 on this adventure littered with humor and drama alike while building or hindering your relationships with each, changing the story and making your playthroughs unique.

Game Features
  • Discover the Gliese 832 c Colony:
    Explore, converse, and make choices that will effect the characters and story
  • Cinematic Experience:
    Fully voiced and animated characters
  • A Larger Universe:
    Experience the first chapter in the Glory Universe
  • Steam Features:
    Supports Steam Achievements with plans to add Steam Trading Cards

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo

short_description: Oddware is a science fiction visual novel about androids in space. You play as an android who meets other androids each with a distinct personalities. Your choices with the other androids will not only shape their personalities, but your own as well. Solve puzzles, mysteries, and your own origins.
